creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: colorful images interspersed with text; images of monks and religious figures conferring inside buildings among clouds; monk in brown robes at end with long hair being groomed by an attendant
medium: Ink printed on paper with hand-applied color
title: Illustrations of the Life and Deeds of the Grand Master of Mount Kōya, vol. 9
